DataElement.preferredName: Radiology Central Review Not Done Reason
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to the reason why radiology central review could not be performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The branch of medical science dealing with the medical use of X-rays or other penetrating radiation._Conducts reviews on behalf of all study sites that agree to participate in the centralized review process with imaging experts.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The branch of medical science dealing with the medical use of X-rays or other penetrating radiation._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed._An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Signals that do not faithfully reproduce actual anatomic structures because of distortion or of addition or deletion of information". Arena et al. Radiographics 1995: A structure or feature only visible as a result of error or limitation of imaging. From the Latin: "artis" = "art" and "facere" = "to make". Hence, literally, "works of art".

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A serial arrangement in which things follow in logical order or a recurrent pattern.: Slice; a thin flat piece cut off of some object.: The physical magnitude of something.
